Module com.game
Package com.game

Class SnakeGameApplication

java.lang.Object
com.almasb.fxgl.app.GameApplication
com.game.SnakeGameApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
Modeled
public class SnakeGameApplication extends com.almasb.fxgl.app.GameApplication implements Modeled
FXGL Snake Game application, manages the game and user input for the game.
